profile.licensesIntro: This app uses the following open source libraries:
profile.mediapipeDescription: Library for real-time body pose recognition.
profile.reactNativeDescription: Framework for building native mobile apps.
profile.expoDescription: Platform for developing React Native apps.
profile.supabaseDescription: Open source backend for authentication and database.
profile.reactNavigationDescription: Navigation library for React Native apps.
profile.visionCameraDescription: Camera library with frame processing capabilities.
profile.reanimatedDescription: Library for smooth and performant animations.
profile.ioniconsDescription: Premium icon set for user interfaces.
profile.agdasimaDescription: Typographic font used in the app interface.
profile.privacyIntro: Welcome to Pusho! This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you use our mobile application for push-up tracking.
profile.privacySection1Text:
The data controller can be reached at the following email address:

Email: pushoapp@gmail.com
profile.privacySection2_1Text:
To create a Pusho account, we collect:

• Email address - For authentication and account-related communications
• Password - Stored in encrypted form (hash)
• Nickname - Unique username displayed in the community (3-20 characters)
profile.privacySection2_2Text:
You may choose to provide:

• Location - City, region, and country
• Geographic coordinates - Latitude and longitude (manually entered)
• Avatar URL - Link to a profile picture
profile.privacySection2_3Text:
During app usage, we collect:

• Push-up count - Number of repetitions per session
• Session duration - Time spent training
• Quality score - Posture assessment (0-100%)
• Set details - Repetitions, quality, and duration for each set
• Workout cards - Used or created workout templates
• Timestamps - Date and time of each session
profile.privacySection2_4Text:
We calculate and store:

• Total cumulative push-ups
• Total number of sessions
• Personal record (maximum in a single set)
• Average quality
• Total time under tension
profile.privacySection2_5Text:
Pusho does NOT collect:

• Videos or images of your workout sessions
• Automatic GPS data (location is manual only)
• Contacts, calendar, or device files
• Advertising identifiers (IDFA/GAID)
• Audio data or voice recordings
profile.privacySection3Text:
We use the collected data to:

• Provide app functionality (Contract execution)
• Authentication and account security (Contract execution)
• Display community leaderboards (Legitimate interest)
• Manage community challenges (Legitimate interest)
• Calculate statistics and progress (Contract execution)
• Improve the application (Legitimate interest)
• Account-related communications (Contract execution)
profile.privacySection4Text:
Pusho uses your device's camera to count push-ups through pose detection. This process:

• Happens entirely on your device (on-device)
• Uses Google's MediaPipe Pose technology
• Does NOT record videos or images
• Does NOT send video frames to external servers
• Processes frames in real-time in device memory

We use MediaPipe Pose, an open-source library by Google distributed under the Apache 2.0 license. This technology detects key body points (landmarks) to determine position during exercise.
profile.privacySection5Text:
Data visible to community:
• Nickname, main badge, location (if provided)
• Push-up count (daily, weekly, monthly)
• Leaderboard position, challenge participation

Service providers:
• Supabase Inc. - Database and authentication (all account and workout data)

We do NOT sell your data to third parties, share data with advertising networks, or use third-party analytics services.
profile.privacySection6Text:
Your data may be transferred and stored on servers located outside your country of residence, including the United States, where Supabase maintains its infrastructure.

These transfers comply with applicable data protection regulations, including EU Standard Contractual Clauses where necessary.
profile.privacySection7Text:
• Account data - Until account deletion
• Workout data - Until account deletion
• Statistics - Until account deletion
• Session tokens - Until logout or expiration
profile.privacySection8Text:
We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data:

• Encryption in transit - All communications via HTTPS/TLS
• Password hashing - Passwords stored in irreversible encrypted form
• Session tokens - Secure authentication with expiring tokens
• Limited access - Data accessible only through authenticated APIs
profile.privacySection9Text:
If you reside in the European Union, you have the following rights:

• Access - Request a copy of your personal data
• Rectification - Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
• Erasure - Request deletion of your data
• Restriction - Limit processing of your data
• Portability - Receive your data in a structured format
• Objection - Object to processing for legitimate reasons

To exercise your rights, contact us at: pushoapp@gmail.com

We will respond within 30 days of receiving the request.
profile.privacySection10Text:
To request deletion of your account and all associated data:

1. Send an email to pushoapp@gmail.com
2. Specify the email address associated with the account
3. Use "Account deletion request" as the subject

We will proceed with deletion within 30 days of identity verification.
profile.privacySection11Text: Pusho is not intended for users under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal data from minors. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal data, contact us to request its removal.
profile.privacySection12Text:
Pusho requires the following permissions:

• Camera (iOS/Android) - Pose detection for push-up counting
• Internet (iOS/Android) - Data synchronization with server
• Vibration (Android) - Haptic feedback during workout
profile.privacySection13Text:
Pusho does NOT use:

• Cookies
• Tracking pixels
• Analytics SDKs (Google Analytics, Firebase Analytics, etc.)
• Advertising identifiers
• Device fingerprinting
profile.privacySection14Text:
We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. In case of substantial changes:

• We will update the "Last updated" date at the top of the document
• We will inform you via in-app notification or email
• Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance
profile.privacySection15Text: For questions, requests, or complaints regarding this Privacy Policy:
profile.termsIntro: Welcome to Pusho! These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of the Pusho mobile application ("App", "Service"). By using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not accept these Terms, do not use the App.
profile.termsSection1Text:
Pusho is a free mobile application that allows you to:

• Automatically count push-ups using the camera and artificial intelligence
• Track workout progress over time
• Create and manage personalized workout cards
• Participate in community leaderboards and challenges (optional)
• Sync data across devices (with registered account)
profile.termsSection2_1Text: You must be at least 16 years old to use Pusho. If you are under 16, you cannot create an account or use the App.
profile.termsSection2_2Text:
To access all features, you need to create an account by providing:

• A valid email address
• A secure password
• A unique nickname

You are responsible for:

• Maintaining the confidentiality of your credentials
• All activities that occur under your account
• Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized access
profile.termsSection2_3Text: You agree to provide accurate information and keep it up to date. You may not impersonate other people or entities.
profile.termsSection3Text:
By using Pusho, you agree NOT to:

• Violate applicable laws or regulations
• Use the App for illegal or unauthorized purposes
• Interfere with the App's or servers' operation
• Attempt to access other users' accounts
• Use offensive, vulgar, or infringing nicknames
• Manipulate leaderboards or statistics fraudulently
• Use bots, scripts, or automated tools
• Collect other users' data without consent
• Upload harmful content, viruses, or malware
• Harass, intimidate, or harm other users

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these rules.
profile.termsSection4_1Text:
The App, including design, logo, code, graphics, and content, is protected by intellectual property rights. You may not:

• Copy, modify, or distribute the App
• Decompile or reverse engineer
• Use our trademark without authorization
profile.termsSection4_2Text: You retain ownership of your personal data and workout statistics. You grant us a limited license to process this data in order to provide the Service.
profile.termsSection5Text:
Pusho is provided "as is" and "as available". We do not guarantee that:

• The Service will be uninterrupted or error-free
• Results obtained will be accurate or reliable
• The App will meet all your expectations

We do our best to keep the App running, but interruptions may occur due to maintenance, updates, or force majeure.
profile.termsSection6_1Text: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we disclaim all warranties, express or implied, including warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.
profile.termsSection6_2Text:
We will not be liable for:

• Indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages
• Loss of data, profits, or opportunities
• Damages arising from use or inability to use the App
profile.termsSection6_3Text:
Pusho is a fitness app and does NOT provide medical advice. Before starting any exercise program:

• Consult a doctor if you have pre-existing health conditions
• Listen to your body and don't exceed your limits
• Stop exercising if you experience pain or discomfort

Use of the App is at your own risk.
profile.termsSection7_1Text:
You can request deletion of your account at any time by sending an email to pushoapp@gmail.com.

Specify the email associated with the account and use "Account deletion request" as the subject. We will process it within 30 days.
profile.termsSection7_2Text:
We may suspend or terminate your account:

• For violation of these Terms
• For fraudulent or illegal activity
• For prolonged inactivity (over 24 months)
• For discontinuation of the Service

Upon termination, you will lose access to data associated with the account.
profile.termsSection8_1Text:
We reserve the right to:

• Modify, suspend, or discontinue features
• Add or remove features
• Change technical requirements

We will do our best to communicate significant changes in advance.
profile.termsSection8_2Text:
The Service may be temporarily unavailable due to:

• Scheduled or emergency maintenance
• Infrastructure updates
• Force majeure (natural disasters, cyber attacks, etc.)

We will not be liable for any Service interruptions.
profile.termsSection9Text:
The processing of your personal data is governed by our Privacy Policy, accessible in the App or by contacting pushoapp@gmail.com.

By using the App, you consent to the collection and use of data as described in the Privacy Policy.
profile.termsSection10Text:
We may modify these Terms at any time. In case of substantial changes:

• We will update the "Last updated" date
• We will notify you via in-app notification or email
• Continued use of the App after changes constitutes acceptance

If you do not accept the changes, you must stop using the App.
profile.termsSection11Text: These Terms are governed by Italian law. For any dispute arising from these Terms or the use of the App, the Court of Bari shall have exclusive jurisdiction.
profile.termsSection12_1Text: These Terms, together with the Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and us regarding the use of the App.
profile.termsSection12_2Text: Failure to enforce any provision of these Terms does not constitute a waiver of the right to enforce it in the future.
profile.termsSection12_3Text: If any provision of these Terms is found invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in effect.
profile.termsSection12_4Text: You may not assign your rights or obligations under these Terms without our written consent.
profile.termsSection13Text: For questions about these Terms of Service:
profile.termsFooter: By using Pusho, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted these Terms of Service.
